trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Santa Rosa
There were no other sightings in Santa Rosa on or around August 12th 2007
Summary: Zig-Zagging bright object at least as far out as a sattelite.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching the beggining of the meteor shower with my son a little after 10pm i'm guessing. we were laying down on our trampalene looking towards the north east. i saw what at first i assumed was a sattelite. i pointed it out to my son and he saw it too. we then noticed it was zig-zagging across the sky and not going straight. it was also pulsating. not blinking but slowly fading in and out. it was moving from south west to north. it was very high in the sky. almost looked like a star that was moving and pulsating. we suddenly did'nt see the object anymore. it lasted probably 20 seconds. very strange. we were both a little shaken afterwards.
